![](bradford-co-groundwater-2018.jpg)

This dataset is a subset of the Shale Network database and includes all groundwater samples from Bradford County in Pennsylvania in the Shale Network database as of May 2018. [Click this link](https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.est.8b01123){target="_blank"} to access the corresponding peer-reviewed article that interprets the dataset. In addition, the dataset can be downloaded via this [data DOI](https://doi.org/10.26208/rj0h-qf52){target="_blank"}.
